column4: hi. I'm on 10.04 LTS, I manually updated my kernel to 2.6.38-something. Synaptic shows that Canonical provides only updates until October 2011 for that kernel. Is this a bug?
You installed a non-logg term support kernel
it was the only .38 kernel available.
The idea behind LTS is also that a kernel will be updated for a longer period of time.
